text: Ngakho-ke baqhubeka bobabili bahamba kwaze kwaba ilapho bobabili befika ebantwini bedolobha bacela ukudla ebantwini balo kepha (abantu bedolobha) benqaba ukubathatha njengezihambeli ngakho-ke bafica kulona udonga olwaseluzodilika ngakho-ke (inceku yethu) yalulungisa (uMose) wathi, “ukube bewuthanda bewuzofuna inkokhelo ngalokho”
